headline: Beer Strength And Buybacks Might Change The Case For Investing In Constellation Brands (STZ)
summary: Constellation Brands recently reported quarterly results that exceeded Wall Street expectations on both revenue and earnings, driven primarily by ongoing strength in its Modelo and Corona beer portfolio and reinforced by continued share repurchases and a focus on premium offerings. This combination of outperformance in the beer segment and management’s emphasis on returning cash to shareholders adds fresh context to earlier concerns about slower organic sales and capital allocation...
